ItemDesc: The fridge carried by Sweet Gorilla. Can be used for the Ascension of Ice characters.
ItemBGDesc: A special SoulGlad fridge designed to preserve icy sweetness. It serves as a tool for transporting drinks for the Sweet Dreams Troupe, and can also be wielded as a weapon when they are transformed into the Dreamjolt Troupe. "Notice: The Sweet Dreams Troupe serves as an outsourcing company for transportation, and SoulGlad Enterprise does not bear any liability in the event of accidents."
